LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Desired.description: It’s important to soak up every bit of information we can, how else are we supposed to learn? Most books are even quite entertaining to boot.
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Disliked.label: disliked
LanguageData.VME_BookReading_Disliked.description: Reading is just such a chore. We retain nothing from it.
